[b]DESCRIPTION[/b]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------		

[i][b]When Marshall Lawson looses his son to a cold-blooded and seemingly random attack, he takes it upon himself to investigate the suspicious circumstances of the brutal killings. Soon he uncovers CTX Majestic, a covert military operation so secret, that now the 
military wants Marshall eliminated. Resolute in his pursuit, Marshall engages in a merciless battle with a drug dealer operation that appears to be secretly funded by a rogue arm of the military.
[/b][/i]
